service.description: Configuration properties for the NIFI service for DC/OS.

name.description: The name of the service to display in the DC/OS dashboard.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Nifi master.

mem.description: Memory (in MB) to allocate to each Nifi instance.

networking.description: Networking-related configuration properties for NIFI on DC/OS.

virtual-host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.

advanced.description: Advanced configuration properties for the Nifi service. Under normal circumstances, you shouldn't need to modify these values.

jvm-opts.description: Optional arguments to pass to the JVM.

docker-image.description: The Docker image to use for the Nifi service.

docker-credentials-uri.description: An optional URI to be fetched and extracted that contains docker credentials (e.g. file:///etc/docker/docker.tar.gz).
